question: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask extension?
answer: The ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask extension is used to display the segmentation masks generated by YOLOv8 model.

question: Where can the yolov8x-seg.pt model file for ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask be found?
answer: The yolov8x-seg.pt model can be found at this URL: https://github.com/ultralytics/assets/releases/download/v8.2.0/yolov8x-seg.pt

question: What is the full name of the ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask extension?
answer: The full name of the ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask extension is ComfyUI_YoloSegment_Mask.

question: What is the function of the Object Mask node in ComfyUI?
answer: The Object Mask node is used to display the segmentation masks from the YOLOv8 model.

question: How do users input the model file for ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask?
answer: The user needs to push the yolov8x-seg.pt model file into the models/yolo directory.

question: What version of the models/yolo directory should the yolov8x-seg.pt model file be pushed into?
answer: The yolov8x-seg.pt model file should be pushed into the version 8.2.0 of the models/yolo directory.

question: Which extension provides the capability to display segmentation masks in ComfyUI?
answer: The ComfyUI-YoloSegment-Mask extension provides the capability to display segmentation masks from the YOLOv8 model in ComfyUI.
